body:
Hi,

my statistics don't load. It's constantly 'calculating'. Any idea what's wrong?
body_tagged:
Hi,

my statistics don't load. It's constantly 'calculating'. Any idea what's wrong?
title: Statistics not loading.

replies.body: It's a bug with new players, I believe. In game you can also view some stats, if your in a certain game mode, do /stats, this gives you your stats for that game mode. /match for the stats of that particular game. Good to see you round! :)
replies.body_tagged: It's a bug with new players, I believe. In game you can also view some stats, if your in a certain game mode, do /stats, this gives you your stats for that game mode. /match for the stats of that particular game. Good to see you round! :)

replies.body: I had the same problem with this account. I recommend reporting on Github. It will get fixed alot quicker.
replies.body_tagged: I had the same problem with this account. I recommend reporting on Github. It will get fixed alot quicker.

replies.body: This is due to a website bug for new users, to view your stats, put /stats at the end of your URL. http://www.avicus.net/RealCrazyCreeper/stats.
replies.body_tagged: This is due to a website bug for new users, to view your stats, put /stats at the end of your URL. http://www.avicus.net/RealCrazyCreeper/stats.
